docs.snippet: Week Ended July 15, 1960 A firm undertone prevailed in the foreign exchange market last week. British, pound sterling and Canadian dollar fluctuated narrowly on moderately active dealings.

docs.snippet: LIMA, Peru, July 16 -- Representatives of three South American nations interested in forming an air union similar to one being discussed in Europe have concluded a meeting here, with delegates of ten other nations attending as observers.

docs.lead_paragraph: CARACAS, Venezuela, July 20 -- The Organization of American States fact-finding mission completed today its investigation of Venezuela's charges that the Dominican Republic organized the attempted assassination of President Romulo Betancourt here June 24.

docs.snippet: Although there has been increasing concern over Soviet economic penetration in Latin America -- Cuba is, of course, the outstanding example -- the Chase Manhattan Bank in its latest quarterly survey of conditions south of the border is not greatly...
docs.lead_paragraph: Although there has been increasing concern over Soviet economic penetration in Latin America -- Cuba is, of course, the outstanding example -- the Chase Manhattan Bank in its latest quarterly survey of conditions south of the border is not greatly alarmed over the situation.

docs.snippet: WORCESTER, Mass., July 21 (AP) -- Mickey Wright, the defending champion from San Diego, took the first-round lead today in the United States women's open golf tournament. She shot a one-under-par 71 over the Worcester Country Club course today.
docs.lead_paragraph: WORCESTER, Mass., July 21 (AP) -- Mickey Wright, the defending champion from San Diego, took the first-round lead today in the United States women's open golf tournament. She shot a one-under-par 71 over the Worcester Country Club course today.

docs.snippet: WORCESTER, Mass., July 22 (AP) -- The defending champion, Mickey Wright of San Diego built her lead in the United States women's open golf championship to two strokes today by posting her second straight orie-under-par 71.
